children.name: custom_image_fit
children.label: Custom image fit
children.inline_help_text: If it is not possible to manually crop all images to the same size and aspect ratio, then you can adjust the image fit settings, but this may result in incorrect image cropping. Be careful with these settings.

children.help_text: Accessible link. Inform when a link opens a new window.

children.name: accessible_link
children.label: Accessible link
children.help_text: Accessible link. Inform when a link opens a new window.

children.name: accessible_link_label
children.label: Accessible link label
children.help_text: If the link title is added at the end of repeated blocks of text, for example “Read more” links at the end of short teasers for blog posts, then you can provide more descriptive link text specifically for screen reader users using Accessible link label. It will be visually hidden for a normal view.
